meanings.sent1: The man's potbelly jiggled as he laughed.
meanings.sent2: She patted her potbelly after a big meal.
meanings.sent3: The potbelly on the snowman made him look quite jolly.
meanings.sent4: The potbelly of the balloon slowly deflated as air escaped.
meanings.sent5: The potbelly of the old furnace rumbled with heat.

meanings.definition: A rounded, bulging shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The potbelly of the vase made it wobble on the table.
meanings.sent2: The potbelly of the pumpkin was perfect for carving.
meanings.sent3: The potbelly of the cloud resembled a fluffy pillow.
meanings.sent4: The potbelly of the hill rolled gently down to the valley.
meanings.sent5: The potbelly of the teddy bear was soft and cuddly.
